claim: Cosmic Girls could play League of Legends alone.

supporting.text: Cosmic Girls is a South Korean girl group, and like any individuals, they have the capability to play video games such as League of Legends alone.

attacks.text: Cosmic Girls is a South Korean girl group, and like any individuals, they have the capability to play video games such as League of Legends alone.
Playing League of Legends alone requires significant time investment and skill, which may not align with the demanding schedules of K-pop idols like Cosmic Girls.
Many K-pop idols are known to play video games during their free time, suggesting that Cosmic Girls could indeed find time to play League of Legends alone.
League of Legends is a team-based game, and playing alone may not be as enjoyable or feasible without teammates, which could deter Cosmic Girls from doing so.
Single-player modes and AI opponents exist in League of Legends, allowing for enjoyable solo gameplay without the need for teammates.

supporting.text: League of Legends is a game that can be played solo, and there is no evidence to suggest that members of Cosmic Girls lack the skills or interest to play it alone.

attacks.text: League of Legends is a game that can be played solo, and there is no evidence to suggest that members of Cosmic Girls lack the skills or interest to play it alone.
While League of Legends can technically be played solo, it is primarily designed as a team-based game, and solo play may not reflect the intended experience or skill requirements.
Even though League of Legends is team-oriented, many players, including professionals, frequently practice and play solo to improve individual skills, making solo play a valid and common activity.
There is no public evidence that any member of Cosmic Girls has expressed interest in or demonstrated the ability to play League of Legends, solo or otherwise.
Celebrities often engage in hobbies privately, and the absence of public evidence does not necessarily imply a lack of interest or skill in playing League of Legends.

supporting.text: Many K-pop idols have publicly shared their interest in gaming, indicating that playing League of Legends alone is within the realm of possibility for Cosmic Girls.

attacks.text: Many K-pop idols have publicly shared their interest in gaming, indicating that playing League of Legends alone is within the realm of possibility for Cosmic Girls.

Many K-pop idols have busy schedules, which may limit their time for gaming, making it less likely for Cosmic Girls to play League of Legends alone.
League of Legends is a team-based game, and playing alone may not be as enjoyable or feasible for someone used to group activities like K-pop idols.
Some K-pop idols have been seen playing solo games or single-player modes, showing that they can enjoy gaming alone despite the team-based nature of League of Legends.

supporting.text: Playing League of Legends alone does not require any special permissions or restrictions, making it accessible to anyone, including members of Cosmic Girls.

attacks.text: Playing League of Legends alone does not require any special permissions or restrictions, making it accessible to anyone, including members of Cosmic Girls.
